artist: Artist: Philippe Jacques de Loutherbourg II
description: sailboat in very rough water, left of center; tiny figure on shore right of center motioning to figures in boat; cloudy skies
inscription:
Inscription

at bottom, printed in black: [Dessiné et gravé par P.J. Loutherbourg  Le Midy.]; on back, in brown ink: [No 1]
portfolio: From Les Quatre Heures du Jour
provenance: [James A. Bergquist, Boston, Mass., until 1999; sold set of four prints in July for PROO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1999-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Le Midy, from "Les Quatre Heures du Jour"
